user_query: I'm planning a surprise party for my best friend's birthday. Can you suggest some unique party themes and decorations? Also, provide me with the latest list of phones registered to my Maytapi WhatsApp product id. Additionally, fetch the contacts associated with my sms77io API key to invite them to the party.

TaskList.description: Gather suggestions for unique party themes and decorations.
Retrieve the latest list of phones registered to the user's Maytapi WhatsApp product ID.
Fetch the contacts associated with the user's sms77io API key.
Compile the list of contacts and send them invitations for the party.
